job_description: Co-op student with programming experience required to help build a software tool to manage our accreditation units. The successful applicant will work closely with Materials Engineering Professors to generate a software interface and database for reporting of academic performance indicators.  The software interface will allow Professors to easily enter marks for specific course components and the database will organize these and other data for later reporting.  The interface will also allow users to generate custom reports including graphs.‚Äù
job_requirements: Background in software engineering, strong programming skills and prior knowledge of database software such as MS Access.Open To All Majors:No
